title: Anticipation for Ethereum [ETH] 2.0 rises as metric reaches all-time high - AMBCrypto News
summary: Ethereum (ETH) staking has reached a new all-time high, with over 15.9 million ETH staked on the Beacon Chain, accounting for 13% of the total supply. The increase in staking might be due to a price surge or the upcoming Shanghai Upgrade, which would allow for ETH withdrawals. Staking rewards have decreased as more ETH is staked, but centralized exchanges or staking pools may offer lower earnings due to validator fees.

title: 55% of Ethereum (ETH) Holdings Now on These Two Exchanges: Details - U.Today
summary:
Sure, here is a summary of the article in less than 256 tokens:

According to Nansen, 55% of Ethereum (ETH) holdings are now on Coinbase and Binance exchanges. Coinbase accounts for 35% of ETH balances, while Binance accounts for 20%. The remaining 45% is held on other exchanges. The top 5 ETH balances are held on Coinbase, Binance, Kraken, Bitfinex, and OKX. Ethereum small addresses have increased following the September Merge update, with a 10.4% quarterly growth in the number of over-one-ETH addresses. Ethereum engineers have made significant advancements towards the planned Shanghai upgrade, which is scheduled for around March and will allow stakeholders to withdraw their ETH and accrued rewards.
